data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Button,
        ContextButton,
        Offscreen,
        Stack,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Button for="offscreen-placement" palette="accent">
    Open PLACED Offscreen
</Button>

<Offscreen
    logic_id="offscreen-placement"
    placement="left"
    hidden
    captive
    dismissible
>
    <Box palette="accent" padding="medium">
        <Stack spacing="medium">
            <ContextButton
                palette="light"
                variation="clear"
            >
                X
            </ContextButton>

            I was PLACED on the LEFT!
        </Stack>
    </Box>
</Offscreen>
data.title: Offscreen Placement
